exercises.name: Low Incline DB Press
exercises.notes: 15° bench angle, tuck your elbows on the negative, flare as you press

exercises.name: Machine Shoulder Press
exercises.notes: Don't stop in between reps, keep smooth and controlled tension on the delts

exercises.name: Cable Crossover Ladder
exercises.notes: Do one set with low cable position, one set with medium-height cable position, and one height with a high cable position

exercises.name: A1: Lean-In Constant Tension DB Lateral Raise
exercises.notes: Lean into a bench and do lateral raises. Keep tension - don't rest your arm against your side at the bottom.

exercises.name: A2: Side Delt Static Stretch (30s)
exercises.notes: Hold a side delt stretch for 30 seconds. The stretch should be held at about a 7/10 intensity.

exercises.name: Overhead Triceps Extension
exercises.notes: Do both arms at once, resist the negative

exercises.name: Med-Ball Close Grip Push Up
exercises.notes: Place your hands on a medicine ball and do smooth, controlled pushups

exercises.name: 1-Arm Half Kneeling Lat Pulldown
exercises.notes: Keep chest tall, keep elbow tucked in close to your torso, focus on squeezing your lat to move the weight

exercises.name: Omni-Grip Lat Pulldown
exercises.notes: One set wide grip (overhand), 1 set middle grip (overhand), 1 set close grip (underhand)

exercises.name: Machine Low Row
exercises.notes: Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together on each rep

exercises.name: Cable Shrug-In
exercises.notes: Set up two cable handles low and shrug up and in. Squeeze your upper traps to move the weight.

exercises.name: Reverse Pec Deck
exercises.notes: Swing the weight "out", not "back"

exercises.name: EZ-Bar Curl (Heavy)
exercises.notes: Arc the bar "out" not "up", focus on squeezing your biceps

exercises.name: A1: EZ-Bar Modified Bicep 21's
exercises.notes: 7 reps seated, 7 reps standing full ROM, 7 reps bottom-half curls

exercises.name: A2: Bicep Static Stretch (30s)
exercises.notes: Hold a bicep stretch for 30 seconds. The stretch should be held at about a 7/10 intensity.

exercises.name: Front Squat
exercises.notes: These will be challenging, let's push! Don't go so heavy that you miss reps. Be humble with your weight and focus on keeping your torso upright

exercises.name: Dumbbell RDL
exercises.notes: Emphasize the stretch in your hamstrings, prevent your lower back from rounding

exercises.name: Walking Lunge
exercises.notes: Take medium strides, minimize the amount you push off your rear leg

exercises.name: Slow Seated Leg Curl (3 up, 3 down)
exercises.notes: Lift with a slow tempo. The positive should take 3 seconds and the negative should take 3 seconds.

exercises.name: Leg Press Toe Press
exercises.notes: Press all the way up to your toes, stretch your calves at the bottom, don't bounce

exercises.name: LLPT Plank
exercises.notes: Contract your glutes and position your elbows under your eyes to make the plank more difficult

exercises.name: Bench Press (Top Set)
exercises.notes: Set up a comfortable arch, quick pause on the chest and explode up on each rep

exercises.name: Bench Press (Back Off AMRAP)
exercises.notes: Use ~60% of the weight you used on your top set and do it for as many reps as possible. You should be in the range of 10-20+ reps on this set! Use a spotter and safety bars!

exercises.name: Standing Dumbbell Arnold Press
exercises.notes: Start with your elbows in front of you and palms facing in. Rotate the dumbbells so that your palms face forward as you press.

exercises.name: Weighted Dip
exercises.notes: Tuck your elbows at 45°, lean your torso forward 15°, shoulder width or slightly wider grip

exercises.name: Machine Lateral Raise (+ Myoreps)
exercises.notes: On the last set only, perform myoreps: After reaching failure at 12-15 reps, pause for ~5 seconds and do another 4 reps. Then pause for ~5 seconds again and do another 4 reps. Repeat until you can't complete 4 reps.

exercises.name: Triceps Pressdown
exercises.notes: Focus on squeezing your triceps to move the weight

exercises.name: 1-Arm Bottom-Half Overhead Cable Tricep Extensions
exercises.notes: Do overhead cable tricep extensions, but cut out the top half of the ROM (stay entirely in the stretched aspect of the lift)

exercises.name: Pull-Up
exercises.notes: 6 cluster sets: 3 reps, rest 15s, repeat 6x. Keep form smooth and controlled.

exercises.name: Wide-Grip Cable Row
exercises.notes: 10 cluster sets: 3 reps, rest 15s, repeat 10x. Keep form tight.

exercises.name: SLOW Barbell Row (3 up, 3 down)
exercises.notes: Use a 3 second positive and a 3 second negative. "Feel" your back working, be humble with the weight you use

exercises.name: Bayesian Cable Curl
exercises.notes: Keep your elbow behind your torso throughout the range of motion, focus on squeezing your bicep. Sets are per arm

exercises.name: Bottom-Half Preacher Curl
exercises.notes: Do preacher curls, but cut out the top half of the ROM (stay entirely in the stretched aspect of the lift)

exercises.name: Rope Facepull
exercises.notes: Pull your elbows up and out, squeeze your shoulder blades together
